description:
Hello.
I'm having a problem using nova node configuration.
I have  a controller node and a compute node.

When I start the service on compute node I get 
"2014-06-17 18:08:27 15268 DEBUG nova.virt.libvirt.driver [-] Connecting to libvirt: qemu:///system _get_connection /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/n
ova/virt/libvirt/driver.py:344
2014-06-17 18:08:28 15268 CRITICAL nova [-] (OperationalError) no such table: instances u'SELECT instances.created_at ..."

Environment : Ubuntu 12.x, IceHouse

Any help is appreciated.
Thank you
title: Compute node configuration issue

comments.content:
Hello.
I'm having a problem using nova node configuration.
I have  a controller node and a compute node.

When I start the service on compute node I get 
"2014-06-17 18:08:27 15268 DEBUG nova.virt.libvirt.driver [-] Connecting to libvirt: qemu:///system _get_connection /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/n
ova/virt/libvirt/driver.py:344
2014-06-17 18:08:28 15268 CRITICAL nova [-] (OperationalError) no such table: instances u'SELECT instances.created_at ..."

Environment : Ubuntu 12.x, IceHouse

Any help is appreciated.
Thank you
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sethu-na

comments.content:
Maybe you did not build db.
$ nova-manange db sync
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dbcocle
